name: Maître du Donjon
description:
You are the dungeon master! Prevent their nasty heroes to collect your gold

Use your cards to place effects and monsters
Move camera: WASD

Note:
We fought against our organization and the elements so our game is a bit unfinished! Please make note of that while playing

Going back to the menu after a gameover prevent the game from working properly so please reload the page manually!
